name: Joyonway
0:
”Alexa, Turn on the all jets on the SPA”
”Alexa, make SPA warmer”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Joyonway offers the voice-controlled SPA experience with Alexa.

Here’s a step by step guide:
(1).Download our “JOYONWAY-Spa Control” app in Google Play or iOS App Store;
(2).Launch the app and register a new account (or login if you’re already registered);
(3).Turn on SPA devices and connect them with “JOYONWAY-Spa Control” app;
(4).IMPORTANT: You can rename the devices with “JOYONWAY-Spa Control” app, then Echo will get name after discovered the devices in Step 9;
(5).Download Amazon “Alexa” app from Amazon Market, Google Play or iOS App Store, and connect Echo with “Alexa” app;
(6).Search the Alexa Skills directory for “Joyonway”;
(7).Click Enable skill of “Joyonway”, then input your account username, password and region on the linking page;
(8).Talk to Echo “Alexa,discover devices”. Wait till Echo says “Discover is completed”;
(9).Now all setup is done. Try talk to Echo to control your devices.

Here are the voice commands Joyonway has:(“SPA” is the name of the device)
Alexa, Turn on the all jets on the SPA
Alexa, Turn off the all jets on the SPA
Alexa, Turn on the jet one on the SPA
Alexa, Turn off the jet one on the SPA
Alexa, Turn on the jet two on the SPA
Alexa, Turn off the jet two on the SPA
Alexa, Turn on the jet three on the SPA
Alexa, Turn off the jet three on the SPA
Alexa, Turn on the jet four on the SPA
Alexa, Turn off the jet four on the SPA
Alexa, Turn on the light on the SPA
Alexa, Turn off the light on the SPA
Alexa, Turn on the blower on the SPA
Alexa, Turn off the blower on the SPA

Alexa, make SPA warmer 
Alexa, make SPA hotter
Alexa, make SPA colder
Alexa, make SPA cooler
